text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Ellisburg, New York |nickname = |settlement_type = Town |total_type = |motto = |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_flag = |flag_size = |image_seal = |seal_size = |image_shield = |shield_size = |image_blank_emblem = |blank_emblem_type = |blank_emblem_size = |image_map = |mapsize = |map_caption = |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |image_dot_map = |dot_mapsize = |dot_map_caption = |dot_x = |dot_y = |pushpin_map = New York#USA |pushpin_label = Ellisburg |pushpin_label_position = |pushpin_map_caption = |pushpin_mapsize = |coordinates = |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = United States |subdivision_type1 = State |subdivision_name1 = New York |subdivision_type2 = County |subdivision_name2 = Jefferson |government_footnotes = |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |leader_title1 = |leader_name1 = |established_title = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |unit_pref = Imperial |area_footnotes = |area_total_km2 = 224.32 |area_land_km2 = 220.72 |area_water_km2 = 3.60 |area_total_sq_mi = 86.61 |area_land_sq_mi = 85.22 |area_water_sq_mi = 1.39 |area_water_percent = 1.60 |elevation_footnotes = |elevation_m = |elevation_ft = |population_as_of = 2020 |population_footnotes = |population_note = |population_total = 3352 |pop_est_footnotes = |population_est = |pop_est_as_of = |population_density_km2 = 15.19 |population_density_sq_mi = 39.33 |timezone = Eastern (EST) |utc_offset = -5 |timezone_DST = EDT |utc_offset_DST = -4 |postal_code_type = |postal_code = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 36-045-24086 }} Ellisburg is a town in Jefferson County, New York. In the 2020 US Census, 3,352 people lived in Ellisburg. The town is in the southwestern corner of Jefferson County and is south of Watertown. The village of Ellisburg is inside the town. == References == Category:Towns in New York (state)
